LanguageData.LingXCG_Carry.label: strength chip
LanguageData.LingXCG_Carry.description: An implantable chip for animals/machinery can enhance the installer's output and enable it to carry more cargo.
LanguageData.LingXCG_EnergyConservation.label: energy saving chip
LanguageData.LingXCG_EnergyConservation.description: An implantable chip for a machine that no longer consumes energy naturally.
